snippet: The school received approval on Thursday from a City Council committee for an expansion that would include building a platform over Franklin D. Roosevelt Drive.
abstract: Rockefeller University receives approval from New York City Council committee for expansion that will include building platform over Franklin D Roosevelt Drive; $240 million project will modernize laboratories and attract new talent; school will pay $8 million to fix sea wall that supports five-block waterfront esplanade adjacent to campus.
lead_paragraph: The school received approval on Thursday from a City Council committee for an expansion that would include building a platform over Franklin D. Roosevelt Drive.

headline.main: Council Committee Approves Expansion by Rockefeller University
headline.print_headline: Council Committee Approves Expansion by Rockefeller U.
